Row.Text: +33% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this City. Increases the distance Corporate pressure emanating from this City can spread by 25% with Mass Media.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Museum.

A Broadcast Tower is a late-game building which increases [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output of the city by 33%. Once Mass Media technology is discovered, the Broadcast Tower also increases the distance Corporate pressure emanating from the city can spread by 25%. The city must possess a Museum before it can construct a Broadcast Tower.
